record.id: field.name="loaded.in.cur.system" and file.name="upgrade" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: loaded.in.cur.system
record.file.name: upgrade

brief.brief: Indicates whether the upgrade process has updated the indicated item.
This field indicates whether the item was upgraded and is available for other applications that depends on it.
If selected (set to true), the upgrade process successfully upgraded this item.
If cleared (set to false), the upgrade process was unable to upgrade this item.
If NULL, the upgrade process has not yet attempted to upgrade this item.

detail.detail: The upgrade process populates this field automatically after attempting to do the update.
In the case of subversion, an application or file required to install the current item was not yet marked true for loaded.in.cur.system.
